column2: SELECT s.plate, s.mjd, s.ra, s.dec, s.fiberid into mydb.MyTable FROM galaxy AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestobjid = p.objid INNER JOIN (SELECT # as StatusCode, ReasonCode, Name FROM ReadyReason UNION SELECT #, ReasonCode, Name FROM DelayReason UNION SELECT #, ReasonCode, Name FROM SpareReason UNION SELECT #, ReasonCode, Name FROM DownReason) SR ON E.StatusCode = SR.StatusCode AND E.ReasonCode = SR.ReasonCode
